mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.name,b.name AS category_name , a.min_price, a.date_add , a.pic FROM shop a LEFT JOIN category b ON a.category_id = b.id
SELECT b.value FROM goods_specification a , goods_specification b WHERE a.id = b.sid AND b.specification='颜色' AND b.goods_id=#{id}
SELECT b.value FROM goods_specification a , goods_specification b WHERE a.id = b.sid AND b.specification='尺寸' AND b.goods_id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET name=#{name},min_price=#{minPrice} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM goods_specification WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} AND value= #{value} AND specification='颜色' AND sid !=0
DELETE FROM goods_specification WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} AND value= #{value} AND specification='尺寸' AND sid !=0
